channel.title: Looking for an rsc account or two
channel.description:
Hi all,
Just wondering if anyone has any old rsc accounts floating around they don't use and wouldn't mind me taking off their hands (with a large chance of getting banned). I'd be willing to part with a few $ if it had anything of value on and was still able to members it up, but basically I'm after a previous members mule or low level or something along those lines which I can use&abuse.
Send me a pm if you can help.
Edit from post below: Just to clarify, Sean and I are working on a new RSCD. It's a bit hard right now to go into specifics, but we need another account or two to get and test specific behavious of packets on a legit server and also to map out and test other parts of the world, quests, etc.

i want an rsc acc L

Sorry for the off-topic, but anyway.

item.title: Looking for an rsc account or two
item.dc:creator: @Sean Sean
item.description:
@Sean wrote:

Meh, I didnt want it stated. But it has been, yes we are toying with a new rscd, theres no grand plan - we are doing it for enjoyment but intend to reach a certain goal. What that goal is, if we are likely to reach it etc etc are just things which will happen over time.

And swotrain the number of accounts that can use rsc is small, none of my accounts can.

Read full topic

Just to clarify, Sean and I are working on a new RSCD. It’s a bit hard right now to go into specifics, but we need another account or two to get and test specific behavious of packets on a legit server and also to map out and test other parts of the world.

Is there any special reason on why you’re writing a new RSCD, or just for your own enjoyment?

item.title: Looking for an rsc account or two
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“Sean, post:15, topic:215461”][quote author=bigh51 link=topic=283184.msg2300652#msg2300652 date=1214598699]

so its okay for someone that is well known to ask for an account and have a risk of getting it banned, but when a no-namer comes and asks for one that wont get banned, its not okay?

We know for certain, 100%, without a shadow of a doubt that eXemplar is not going to scam anyone or do anything stupid.

The same can’t be said for most of the community. Just the way it is.
[/quote]he just admitted that the account might be banned. and that isnt doing anything stupid?

When using any 3rd party program to access runescape, there is a chance the account could be banned for various things if something goes wrong. He isnt going to stand outside a bank doorclosing, do you even know who he is? He isnt some 4chan retard like the majority of the people here.[/quote]i know that he is well known, and 99% of these people dont even know what 4chan is. they are just 8 year old retards.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for an rsc account or two
item.dc:creator: @Sean Sean
item.description:
@Sean wrote:

[quote=“bigh51, post:13, topic:215461”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=283184.msg2300593#msg2300593 date=1214595147]

so its okay for someone that is well known to ask for an account and have a risk of getting it banned, but when a no-namer comes and asks for one that wont get banned, its not okay?

We know for certain, 100%, without a shadow of a doubt that eXemplar is not going to scam anyone or do anything stupid.

The same can’t be said for most of the community. Just the way it is.
[/quote]he just admitted that the account might be banned. and that isnt doing anything stupid?[/quote]

When using any 3rd party program to access runescape, there is a chance the account could be banned for various things if something goes wrong. He isnt going to stand outside a bank doorclosing, do you even know who he is? He isnt some 4chan retard like the majority of the people here.

Read full topic
